english: Excuse me / May I bother you?
Oh! / Ouch! (expression of surprise or pain)
Beautiful / Pretty / Nice (often for things or general appearance)
The (plural, for people, similar to Deng)
Wait a moment / Just a moment
To sail / To travel by boat
Feeling / To feel (Tagalog loan, `Damdam` is native)
Hope (Tagalog loan, `Panayan` is native for 'to expect')
To pass by / To go through
To pass by / To go past
To undress / To take off clothes
Subject of study / What is being studied
You have no day (You are wrong/out of luck)
You've been waiting for a long time
Do you like anything? / Do you want anything?
I feel pain / I am hurt
He/she has no sickness / It's not painful
Do you know anything about this?
The house is destroying / getting ruined
He/she is buying in the market
The sun returned / It's daytime again
